short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI tool to generate personalized responses to customer inquiries for Etsy sellers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message Automater is a Chrome extension designed to streamline customer service interactions for online store managers, particularly those using platforms like Etsy. The extension automates chat message handling, improves response efficiency, and ensures polished communication with its built-in ai grammar correction tool.
